Title: Untimely Resurrection
Writer: Diana Gabaldon (based on the series of books written by), Ronald D. Moore (developed by), Richard Kahan (written for television by)
Actors: Caitriona Balfe, Sam Heughan, Tobias Menzies, Duncan Lacroix
Plot: After the dinner party, Claire tends to Mary (and Alex), while Jamie deals with Charles' plotting. A visit to Versailles leads to turmoil for Claire and Jamie.
